CmdLine: apk update   && apk add --update alpine-sdk python   && yarn global add @angular/cli@1.7.4   && ng set --global packageManager=yarn   && apk del alpine-sdk python   && rm -rf /tmp/* /var/cache/apk/* *.tar.gz ~/.npm   && npm cache clean --force   && yarn cache clean   && sed -i -e "s/bin\/ash/bin\/sh/" /etc/passwd
